measured_by: 2-player iterated cooperative decision-making task (virtual parking-lot game)
justification: “The task is designed in such a way that better performance, in the form of a lower cost incurred, requires a coherent strategy on the part of the two players; thus, the cost paid by participants in a pair is a key behavioral indicator of effective norm formation.”

measured_by: algorithmic classification of pair decisions (Strategy Classification, Algorithm 1)
justification: “To identify types of norms and their frequency of appearance, we developed a simple algorithm (Algorithm 1) for classifying the norms developed within pairs over the course of a game.”

measured_by: GPT-4 classification of pre-game written plans
justification: “Before starting the game, participants wrote strategic plans… we used a large language model (GPT-4) to classify written plans across conditions according to the category of norm expressed.”
